name: ALTHEIS LTD
goal:
The goal of our Law firm is to represent and defend the interests of our clients before the European institutions and to counsel them on the EU legislation and policies.

For this purpose, our EU Lawyers participate at meetings, working groups, panel discussion and forum relating to our domains of specialisation.

We prepare drafts and papers to communicate on the EU matter and to put forward our analysis on our domains of specialisation, international trade, financial regulation, European and International business law, corporate acquisition & merger.

We provide our clients with updated European and International legislation.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Transnational cooperation programmes

Corporate legislation

Financial regulation

International trade

Competition Law

Eurojust
